name: Card Nation
storyline:
INDIAN CARD GAMES AT ITS BEST: 
Feel how great are Indian card games and what qualities it will help you develop, experience yourself with Card Nation. Traditional card games even helps to develop essential life skills of social interaction and decision making. We should keep playing our traditional games in order to bridge the generations! 
 
REALTIME ONLINE + OFFLINE MULTIPLAYER: 
We've included both online and offline multiplayer modes so you can enjoy Card Nation at its best. For now there are three online multiplayer games and one offline multiplayer game and more games coming soon. Available games are: 
 
ONLINE: 
1) Do Teen Panch(2-3-5) -3 Players 
2) Biscuit - 2 Players 
3) Gulam Chor (Beta) - 4 Players 
 
OFFLINE: 
1)BISCUIT - 2 Players 
 
CREATE A ROOM, INVITE AND FUN BEGINS: 
Keep the fun going by playing games and kill some time with your loved ones. Along with playing game, you can even interact with your friends with in-game chat feature in selected games.
summary:
Popular Indian card games at one place. Play online with your Family and Friends! 
 
Card Nation is a collection of some best indigenous card games which most of us played in past, now you can enjoy playing these games with your Family and Friends anywhere across the globe. 
 
Challenge your buddies and show them who rules the Card Nation!
